name: @zabaca/lattice
description: Human-initiated, AI-powered knowledge graph for markdown documentation

scripts.build: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target bun --packages external
scripts.release:patch: bun test && bun pm version patch && bun publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: bun test && bun pm version minor && bun publish && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: bun test && bun pm version major && bun publish && git push && git push --tags

author: Zabaca
